Static vigilance is nice, but this guy came out in a set with [Necrotic Ooze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrotic Ooze). I think they are just trying to find ways to coax players into Ooze decks.  
  
And if you draft a bunch of equips this guy is a great pick.
